Ilja Preuss wrote:
>  > Marathon
>  > Jacareto
>  > Abbot
>  > Pounder
>  > Jemmy Module
>  > JFCUnit
> 
> I only know Jemmy and JFCUnit, and from those two I'd definitely prefer
> Jemmy.

...and for examples on using them well, get a copy of _TDD: A Practical 
Guide_. It's still the only TDD/JUnit book that shows us how to 
test-drive a desktop GUI.

You also might want to find a Yahoo! group called 
"testfirstuserinterfaces" and ask there.
